body_html:
@beniroquai Yes, you may be able to strip some unnecessary nodes out of the GraphDef with the optimize_for_inference.py script.

If there are some other non-size related issues with the pb file that may also expose them, as the ParseFromZeroCopyStream can fail for other reasons as well. I've verified that I can load a 85mb GraphDef file via ParseFromZeroCopyStream so it's not a 64mb limitation, at least.

If you want to load directly from the sdcard just adb push it to your device and use a regular filepath in ClassifierActivity.java -- i.e. strip off the file:///android_asset/ prefix.
